subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Peter Fill of Italy took advantage of an early start to win his first World Cup downhill in Lake Louise, Alberta. Carlo Janka of Switzerland started 65th but finished a surprising second. Bode Miller was 16th. ¶Tessa Worley of France overcame driving snow and poor visibility to win a giant slalom at the Aspen Winternational in Colorado for her first World Cup victory. aspen (AP).
